support.title: Local AJSEE support
support.text: Not sure about the steps or ran into a problem? Message us — we’ll guide you through the booking in your language.
support.textMobile: Need help booking? Message us — we’ll help in your language.

1.title: Open the listings
1.text: Click the button to open TrustedStays (opens in a new tab).

2.title: Pick destination & dates
2.text: Search UK stays by city, dates and number of guests.

3.title: Complete the booking
3.text: Payment and confirmation happen directly on TrustedStays.

q1.a: No — your booking and payment are completed on TrustedStays.

q2.q: Why do I leave AJSEE to book?
q2.a: We use a referral link to TrustedStays® to track visits. It doesn’t change your price.

q3.q: Can you help if I get stuck?
q3.a: Yes. Message us and we’ll help you in your language.

q4.q: Who handles cancellations or booking changes?
q4.a: Cancellations and changes are handled by TrustedStays® under their booking terms. If you’d like, AJSEE can help you navigate the process and communication.

accommodation.disclaimer: AJSEE is not the accommodation provider or a payment service. Booking terms are set by TrustedStays®.

final.title: Ready? Choose your UK stay.
final.text: TrustedStays opens in a new window and you complete the booking with our partner.
